data.name: Slapshot: Rebound
data.detailed_description:
Take to the ice in this physics-based multiplayer game where you play an arcade style match of hockey. No shoot button, no puck glue, no RNG. It’s up to you and your team to take control of the puck, pass, shoot, outplay your opponents. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players!

Free-to-Play

Slapshot: Rebound is free-to-play indefinitely.

Cosmetic elements are available for purchase and obtainable through gameplay.
We do not participate in any form of pay-to-win, because that sucks.

Train like the pros

Become the best player in Slapshot Rebound with several training modes that test your skills to the max, beat your high score and get better through small minigames.


Climb to the top

Stake your claim as the best Slapshot: Rebound player as you climb the leaderboard rankings


Customize yourself

Style your Slapatar with countless cosmetic items, from hats and hair to gloves and glasses, personalise and accessorise your character however you want as you show off to your teammates and opponents on the ice


COMING SOON: The Pond

Socialise, Skate and Slap! In this open area you can chat, practice and have fun with others without any pressure alongside waiting while you queue for some Rebound games. Gone are the days of being stuck in a menu or chat screen.

Are you ready to take to the ice?

data.short_description: Slapshot: Rebound is a physics-based multiplayer game where you play an arcade style match of hockey. No shoot button, no puck glue, no RNG. It’s up to you and your team to take control of the puck, pass, shoot, outplay your opponents. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players!
data.reviews:
“Since I've started playing Slapshot, I just feel like I'm a better person”
Nasher

“I would definitely recommend ice hockey lovers give this game some time, especially if you are sick of the “big game” in the ice hockey market.”
Operation Sports

“I'm a Slapshot main now, b*tch”
Rizzo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760 / R9 270 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.14: Mojave
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
